title: recipes_Marty's_Loosemeat_Sandwich
text:
Title: Marty's Loosemeat Sandwich.
.
Description: A quick and easy loose meat sandwich consisting of ground beef, beer and yellow mustard. Serve on hamburger buns with a little chopped onion and mustard on top..
.
Ingredients:.
- 1 pound lean ground beef.
- 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer.
- 1 teaspoon salt.
- 1 teaspoon granulated sugar.
- 0.5 teaspoon ground black pepper.
- 2 teaspoons yellow mustard.
.
Instructions:.
- In a medium skillet over medium heat, cook the ground beef until evenly browned; drain..
- Stir in beer, salt, sugar, pepper, and yellow mustard. Bring to a boil, and reduce heat to low; simmer partially covered. Remove from heat the moment all the liquid has evaporated..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 228 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 3 g.
cholesterolContent: 57 mg.
proteinContent: 14 g.
saturatedFatContent: 6 g.
sodiumContent: 442 mg.
sugarContent: 1 g.
fatContent: 16 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 6 servings.
